transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Yes ma'am. Hello.
Executive: Ma'am, IndiaMART ka aapka plan hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji. Aur bataiye ma'am.
Executive: Mujhe ek fraud ke bare mein complaint karni hai.
Customer: Ek fraud ke bare mein complaint karni hai? Matlab buyer ke end se?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ah, ma'am, aapne IndiaMART ka control panel aapne open kiya hai?
Customer: Ah, phone se. Jahan se aap bylist vgera.
Executive: Aap desktop wala jahan se aap bylist vgera consume karte ho?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ek minute mein kar deti hu.
Executive: Haan, wahan pe aap open kijiye.
Customer: Ji bataiye. Isme aa raha hai dashboard, profile, lead manager.
Executive: Nahi, right hand side pe aapko help ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Help ka option aaya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Help mein dekhiye raise a complaint ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Isme aa raha hai. Ek minute. Raise a complaint.
Customer: Ek minute mein dobara dekhti hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Help mein gayi for buying selling. Share your feedback raise a complaint. Thik hai.
Executive: Raise a complaint.
Customer: Complaint against the buyer.
Executive: Complaint against complaint against the buyer aa raha hoga.
Customer: Hmm. Hmm.
Customer: Aaya?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan aa gaya. Sir, ab wahan aa gaya na? Wahan pe aap buyer ke against buyer ki details maang raha hoga aap se.
Customer: Hmm. Hmm.
Customer: Bhej diya?
Customer: Haan, woh aa gaya woh details mein likh dungi. But isme aa raha hai ki kuch file vgera choose karne ke liye. Toh kya usme WhatsApp ke documents vgera daal du?
Executive: Haan, aapke saare proofs chahiye honge. Aapke jo jo baatein matlab hui hai na, chat exchange hua hai ya invoice vgera. Toh woh saari cheeze wahan pe chahiye hogi.
Customer: Toh woh pages ke ho jayenge.
Executive: Toh ma'am woh attachment aap PDF convert karke wahan pe attach kar dijiye na.
Customer: Isme pure 5-600 pages.
Executive: Aapke. Toh kya samajh kya ma'am?
Executive: Kya bol rahi hai?
Customer: Woh toh ma'am agar mein screenshot lungi uska toh 5-600 pages ho jayenge.
Executive: Ma'am, paanch screenshot aap lete na toh aap uska ek file aur folder bana sakte ho.
Customer: Paanch hai kya?
Executive: 5-600 pages ho jayenge ma'am.
Executive: Toh ma'am ek folder ya PDF vgera bana do na. 100 pages se mat karo. Main main de do na. Fir meri team jab aapko approach karegi na legal team, aap unko fir uske according share karte rahiyega.
Executive: Aapko over jab aap complaint register kar doge na toh fir legal team na over the call, over the email, over the WhatsApp aapko connect karti hai if they require more details on this.
Customer: Mein yeh file files nahi daalti hu. Aisa karti hu mein abhi complaint raise kar deti hu.
Executive: Haan, complaint raise kariye lekin attachment mein aapko kuch na kuch lagana padega. Jo basic wala hoga na aapka jisme thoda bahut proof ho raha hoga conversation ka, woh kar dijiyega.
Customer: Hmm. Accha.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai ma'am.
Executive: Toh aapne abhi mere customer yahan pe customer care pe call kiya hua tha?
Customer: Haan, woh jo aa rahe hai na ma'am, unko call kar rahi thi. Woh unka pick nahi ho raha hai shayad. Woh lunch vunch pe gaye ho.
Executive: Kis woh kisko call kar rahi thi?
Customer: Jo aa rahe hai jinka call aata hai na baar baar, mein unko kar rahi thi. Toh unka pick nahi ho raha hai. Shayad woh lunch par gaye ho.
Executive: Haan, sir, Shahnawaz ma'am aaj leave pe hai. Mein unki manager baat kar rahi hu. Woh medical leave pe hai aaj woh. Isliye call mere paas answer hua hai.
Customer: Haan, aapne customer care pe jab 9696 pe call milaya na toh call mere customer care ke through mere paas reroute hoke aaya hai.
Customer: Hmm. Thik hai ma'am, thik hai.
Executive: Hai na? Haan. Toh mein aapko batau thoda sa kya issue hua hai?
Executive: Ya kya issue batana chah rahe ho aap? Buyers ke saath mein jo issue aaya hai?
Customer: Haan ma'am.
Customer: Toh aap bataiye kya tha?
Customer: Ma'am, actually IndiaMART par ek buyer ne humare saath connect kiya tha aur usne humko bola tha ki humko yeh fabric chahiye. Toh humne usko bola ki aap humko sample do. Usne bola ki mere paas sample nahi hai. But yeh best quality hai, yeh woh vgera.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Thik hai. Toh humne unko quotation vgera di thi. Toh jo quotation unhone di thi woh reason mein se end se galat ho gayi.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Toh one month ke baad unhone humko bataya ki yeh quotation galat ho gayi hai aur ab yeh hai. Toh humne unko usi time pe bola ki sir yeh quotation galat ho gayi hai and we are really sorry. Aap ya toh order cancel kar dijiye humare end se ya fir mein jo matlab obviously hum bhi loss le rahe the ki hum is rate pe aapko de denge. Is expected amount pe hum aapko yeh de dete hai. Aapko yeh ab is rate mein milega. Toh woh finally maan gaya.
Customer: Thik hai. Aur fir jab usne humko sample bheja ek dedh mahine ke baad toh pata chala ki woh machine made sample hai. Aur humse usne handloom banwane ke liye kaha tha. Yeh handloom. Jo machine ka sample hota hai woh 2-2.5 mahine mein complete hota hai. Jo handloom matlab obviously haath se ban raha hai toh woh haath wala jo sample hota hai woh 5-6 mahine mein complete hota hai. Yeh saari baatein humari conversation WhatsApp par hai aur maine mail bhi kiya hai abhi 10 din pehle. Toh usne mujhe bola tha ki mujhe apne buyer ko yeh mujhe mail kar dijiye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh uske liye maine mention kiya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Haan. Toh ma'am abhi aap toh iske iske liye jo complaint register kar rahe ho na toh woh buyer se hum log jaise servicing team hai. Hai na? Toh hum servicing team ko woh nahi karte hai connect. Toh hum jo connect karte hai woh legal team hi buyer ko connect karti hai. Toh woh aap jitni details likhna chah rahe ho na aap usme dekhiyega pura product title vgera sab kuch maang raha hai wahan pe. Toh aap usko karke submit kar dijiye. Team aapko uski status ke according aapko connect kar legi. Thik hai?
Customer: But ma'am ek baat batao fir agar maan lo jaise ki aaj meri usse baat hui thi. Ab usne bola hai ki mujhko toh sample hi nahi chahiye yeh woh. Usme kam se kam ₹2 lakh humare fans gaye hai. Mein pichle dedh mahine se usse payment maang rahi hu. Sir payment kar do. Usne pehle starting mein payment kari thi but woh saari payment lag chuki hai usme jo fabric ban chuka hai. Maine usko bola ki jo fabric ban chuka hai woh aap le lo. Agar aage ka banwana hai toh aap baki ki payment kar do. Tab hum aage ka banwa denge.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Thik hai. Toh obviously si baat hai na ma'am abhi tak toh usne humko ₹1 bhi diya nahi hai. Jo bhi lag rahe hai humare ghar se lag rahe hai. Toh ab aise mein woh humare liye kuch ulta seedha likh de ya hume feedback kharab de de usse humari goodwill bhi kharab hogi. Humara business bhi kharab hoga. Aur uss upar se abhi toh mein usse phone pe baat ki woh toh gaali galoch bhi kar raha hai ki mein yeh kar dunga woh kar dunga. Ya ki hum starting se har har ek point pe hum transparent rahe hai uske saath.
Executive: Koi nahi ma'am toh aap abhi jo fasa hua paisa hai woh nikalna chah rahe ho ki deal pura done karwana chah rahe ho?
Customer: Ma'am hum chah rahe hai ki yeh jo fabric ban gaya hai woh utha le woh jo bhi uska sample bacha hai aur.
Executive: Haan toh ma'am meri legal team waise hi waise hi handle karke waise hi mutual understanding pe hi close karwayegi. Ab ma'am buyer se toh mein baat kar nahi sakti. Mein toh buyer ka prospective jaan ke aapko samjhati. Lekin mein unko call kar nahi sakti. Toh woh abhi dekhte hai fir ma'am woh log khud handle karenge aur batayenge aapko. Thik hai?
Customer: Mein apne side se jitna hoga.
Customer: Koi humara humara koi review kharab likh de jiski wajah se humara business.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi ma'am. No ma'am. Nothing. Nahi. Kuch nahi. Aisa kuch nahi hoga.
Customer: Matlab aisa toh nahi hai na aap sure ho na ki is prakar.
Executive: Nahi nahi yes ma'am yes ma'am yes ma'am yes ma'am.
Executive: Nahi nahi ma'am nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Okay ma'am. Thank you.
Executive: Toh yeh request mein close kar du aapka? Yeh jo aapne yahan pe call kiya tha 9696 pe?
Customer: Hmm. Thik hai ma'am aap close kar dijiye.
Executive: Ma'am legal team ke liye toh aap already open kar rahe ho na complaint?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Woh complaint hi open kar rahe ho aap. Haan. Haan. Mein isko close kar rahi hu aur Shahnawaz aapko us complaint ke jo legal complaint register karoge uske liye aapko connect kar lenge. Thik hai?
Customer: Okay ma'am. Thank you.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to complain about fraud by a buyer.

- Buyer sent machine-made sample after agreeing to handloom.

- ₹2 lakh is stuck with the buyer.

- Concerned about negative feedback affecting goodwill.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to raise a complaint.

- Advised to attach proofs and details in complaint.

- Legal team will handle the complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the current request.

- Legal team will connect for the legal complaint.



Alert (If Any):

- fraud

- complaint

- escalation



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, complaint, buyer, legal team, payment, sample
